yous a soldier youre probably packing heat up there met up with homies from the street and got deep up there if you only knew the way i felt before they ruined the crew i thought i learned from eazy now im going through it with you we lost a thug a son and a father i spoke to your son the other day and told him uncle dre got him the lord must be accidentally pulling your file cause im still paging you 911 straight in denial prayin you get it but no man can choose the card he was dealt you either quit or you gon play it like you get it i done been through all emotions from in shock to keeping a poker face to straight breaking down and showing all emotions im anxious to believing real gs dont cry if thats the truth then im realizing i aint no gangsta its just not me but you know imma always ride wit you i miss you sometimes i wish i just died with you
